sections.heading: of swine; contracts allowed; conditions
sections.text: Section 54-2607 does not apply to any contract to purchase swine at a certain date or time if the following requirements are met:(1) The difference in price is based on: (a) A payment method specifying prices paid for criteria relating to carcass merit; or (b)
